name: Mod Support
sect: Mod files must use the .pcmod file extension and must use valid command syntax. PieClicker mods must be added in a folder titled 'mods' in the game files and a full game re-launch must be done to activate any mods added.
hist: Mod support was added as a last minute feature in the first release of PieClicker on Steam and doesn't exist in any other version.
